items.sentence: I have no idea what happened in that basement.
How many times do I have to explain it to you?
Tom woke up the next morning and went to work.
Do you want me to show you the pictures again?
We have to talk a little bit first, you and I.
That was more difficult to do than I expected.
I'm hoping it'll rain. Tom is hoping it won't.
We hope that someday we'll be able to do that.
We're prepared for anything that might happen.
I'll give a bunch of flowers to my girlfriend.
